EmailTemplate.description: Sent to a requestor after access has been deactivated
EmailTemplate.name: Access Has been Deactivated
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation - Access for {!UserProvisioningRequest.ExternalUserId} is revoked to {!UserProvisioningRequest.AppName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!UserProvisioningRequest.Requestor__c},
This email is your notification that access has been revised in {!UserProvisioningRequest.AppName}. User ID is listed below.
Your user ID is: {!UserProvisioningRequest.ExternalUserId}
Please log into the application at: {!UserProvisioningRequest.BusinessLink_URL__c}
If you have any questions or concerns, please call us toll free at 1-866-270-4706 or email at websitesupport@landolakes.com. Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you in the future.
Sincerely,
Business Link
